raw_body:
SENEVIRATNE – MADDUMAGE DON HENRY “Sene” (Former General Manager – State Hardware Corporation,​ Yakkala). Beloved husband of Dr A.S. “Vasantha” Seneviratne (Former Associate Professor of the Department of Botany,​ University of Colombo),​ father of Sandhya and Sakuntala (Consultant Obstetrician and Gynaecologist),​ father-in-law of Dimuth,​ grandfather of Anandika and brother of Chandra,​ Hema,​ Sita and late Vinitha,​ passed away peacefully on 28th March 2024. The remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour. Pansakulaya will be held at the Parlour on Saturday,​ the 30th at 1.00 p.m. Cortege leaves Parlour on the same day at 2.00 p.m. for Cremation at 2.30 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (New Crematorium – Kitulwatte Road entrance).
022227
